vlive.korean: 근데 여기 좁아서... But it's tight here... 듣기 View video ASTRO : 같이 놀자요😊
이게 자리가 좁아서 멈추기가 힘들어요. The space is small so it's hard to stop. 듣기 View video FTISLAND : [FULL] FTISLAND 여름밤의 꿈 COMEBACK VLIVE [DRIVE-IN FTISLAND]
vlive.english: The space is small so it's hard to stop.

vlive.korean: 제가 좁아서 못 나가요 제가 나가지를 못해서... I can't go forward. It's too crowded. 듣기 View video GOT7 : GOT7(갓세븐) MONOGRAPH "Present : YOU" EP.03
vlive.english: I can't go forward. It's too crowded.

vlive.korean: 무대가 좁아서 퀄리티가 안 보이잖아. The stage was small, so you couldn't see the quality. 듣기 View video MOMO X : [아큐멘터리] 찬란한 MY '웨이' 업텐션 웨이 2부
vlive.english: The stage was small, so you couldn't see the quality.

vlive.korean: 나 다 했는데 여기 너무 좁아서 무서워. I used to be able to do everything but it's so narrow here. 듣기 View video MONSTA X : [몬채널][B] EP.108 '몬스타엑스레이3' 7화
vlive.english: I used to be able to do everything but it's so narrow here.

examples.korean: The narrowness of the streets caused many traffic problems. 발음듣기 도로가 좁아서 많은 교통 문제가 야기되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The narrowness of the streets caused many traffic problems. 발음

examples.korean: The road was so narrow that cars were unable to pass. 발음듣기 도로가 너무 좁아서 차들이 지나가지를 못했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The road was so narrow that cars were unable to pass. 발음

examples.korean: The narrow windows admit little light into the room. 발음듣기 창문들이 좁아서 방에 빛이 조금밖에 안 들어온다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The narrow windows admit little light into the room. 발음

examples.korean: The narrow gateway left me little margin for error as I reversed the car. 발음듣기 출입구가 좁아서 내가 (차를) 후진할 때 실수를 해도 되는 여지가 거의 없었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The narrow gateway left me little margin for error as I reversed the car. 발음

examples.korean: The vacant seat next to him was too small to sit in. 발음듣기 그의 옆에 비어 있는 자리는 너무 좁아서 앉을 수가 없다. 절대어휘 5100
examples.english: The vacant seat next to him was too small to sit in. 발음
